function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor air quality contributing to increased number of deaths","Impact":"Increased mortality rates due to respiratory and other related illnesses","Mitigation":"Improving air quality through filtration, ventilation, and emission control measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilation systems, emission control technologies","People":"General public, especially those with respiratory illnesses","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, building owners"},{"Description":"Transmission of viruses through bioaerosols","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Use of masks, social distancing, and vaccination, as well as improving indoor ventilation and air filtration","Technologies":"Face masks, HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"General public, healthcare workers, indoor occupants","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, building owners"},{"Description":"Survival of SARS-CoV-2 in the air and on surfaces","Impact":"Prolonged exposure and potential transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, maintaining indoor air quality, and using personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Disinfectants, air purifiers, PPE (masks, gloves)","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, facility management"}]}
